caption.title: Distribution of ten coupled ocean-atmosphere model projections for the increase in mean temperature in Noumea.
caption.p: The boxplot (over the ten GCM selected) of the average increase in mean temperature is given for two climate change scenarios (RCP 4.5 and RCP 8.5) and two time periods relative to the historical series of temperature (1980â€“1999).
